front.title: Elis Helrot
front.gametext: At any time (except during battle), target any or all of your characters at one site to 'transport' (relocate) to any one other site. Draw destiny. Use that much Force to 'transport,' or place Interrupt in Lost Pile.
front.lore: A Givin pilot who can seal his joints to withstand the vacuum of space. Makes slaving and spike runs to Kala'uun. Has made many special modifications to his ship, the Hinthra.

canceledBy: Quite A Mercenary makes all characters transported by Elis Helrot lost
rulings: The destiny draw and cost are paid during initiation, and then responses (e.g. Sense) may take place.
If retargeted by I Have A Bad Feeling About This, it must EITHER select new characters to be transported OR select a new destination site.
If using I Have A Bad Feeling About This to choose new characters, the new characters may be at the same origin site or a different origin site, but it cannot include any of the original characters.
